column4: Hello, I have been using Teamviewer as a remote assistance for my Ubuntu friends who need help, question is: Is there an opensource product out there that is as slick as Teamviewer? It is soooo easy to use....
Coolabra, its not, I'm being sincere..
Another question: I see a new release is here 10.04.1  How do I upgrade to 10.04.1 from 10.04??? Or is it automatic via the regular updatyes???
it it automatic, type lsb_release -a to see
